sentence.Network_en: Wonderfully melodic and tuneful, his songs have made me weep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的歌旋律优美、悦耳动听，让我潸然泪下。

sentence.Network_en: We can ill affored to lose tuneful wind - pipes like yours when they fall among us.
sentence.Network_cn: 像你有这么一个好嗓子,已经到了我们这儿来,又要跑掉,真叫我们舍不得.

sentence.Network_en: He welcomed Jewish performers to Bayreuth, and enjoyed the tuneful , popular music of Verdi and Donizetti.
sentence.Network_cn: 她曾经多次在拜罗伊特盛情接待希特勒并鼓励孩子们和希特勒在Wahnfried的花园里一起玩耍.

entry.def: A piece of music that is tuneful has a pleasant tune.
